scripts.build:old: npm run lint:fix && npm run build:clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:clean: find public_html -mindepth 1 ! -name '.gitkeep' -delete 2>/dev/null || rm -rf public_html/* public_html/.* 2>/dev/null; mkdir -p public_html; touch public_html/.gitkeep
scripts.build:copy: cp -r src/* public_html/ && rm -rf public_html/styles/*.scss public_html/styles/blocks public_html/styles/helpers public_html/main.css.map public_html/node_modules public_html/package*.json public_html/package*.json.old public_html/.idea && find public_html -name '*.map' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:css:fix
scripts.fix: npm run lint && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
